斔字的基本解释

斔
yǔ
古同“斞”：“斔斛不敢入于四竟。”

斔
zhōng
古同“鍾”，古代容量单位，六斛四斗。

斔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔ］
［《集韻》勇主切，上麌，以。］
容量名。

斔字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【文字部】　斔； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页477第21
【正字通】同斞。【莊子·田子方】斔斛不敢入於四境。【註】斔音庾，六斛四斗曰斔。司馬本斔讀曰終。

斔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
斔字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Chuckle
yǔ
Gu Tong "Mo": "We dare not enter the four competitions."
Chuckle
zhōng
In ancient times, the "bell" was the ancient capacity unit, six hu and four buckets.

[①] [yǔ]
["Jiyun" courageously cut, go up, to. ]
Capacity name.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Writing Department] 　斔; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 477-21
【Zhengzitong】The same thing. [Zhuangzi·Tian Zifang] Dendrobium dare not enter the four realms. 【Note】Yin Yu, Liu Hu and Four Dou said Ye. Sima Benyi read it at the end.
